questions.question: Explain why the digital video camera needs secondary storage.
Explain why solid state storage is the most appropriate type of storage for the digital video camera.
Calculate the number of videos that could be stored on the computer if each video was 100MB in size. Show your working.
Write an algorithm using pseudocode to calculate the number of bytes in a given number of megabytes.
Identify the backup method William should use to backup the computer, justifying your choice.
Give one additional utility program William could make use of and describe how he would use it.
Explain how a Creative Commons license will impact the use of William’s videos by other people.
Identify if the house network is a LAN (local area network) or a WAN (wide area network). Justify your choice.
Tick (3) one box in each row to identify if the description is more appropriate for Ethernet or WiFi.
keywords: More likely to be affected by interference
Data can be transmitted at a faster speed
Shorter transmission range before data is lost

questions.question: Describe the purpose of the router in the house’s network.
Identify two additional items of network hardware, apart from cables and a router, that may be used within the house network.
Name the system which matches URLs to IP addresses on the web.
Write the missing statements in the correct place to complete the description of what happens after the IP address has been found and returned to the user’s computer.
keywords: The request is put into packets
The packets are sent across the network
If they have not arrived: A timeout is sent to request the packets are resent
If they have arrived: The server checks if all the packets have arrived
Each packet is given the address and a number

questions.question: Describe three possible threats to the computers connected to the network and give one way each threat can be reduced or prevented.
Discuss the impact on the island’s inhabitants and businesses of getting access to the Internet.
keywords: connection with the rest of the world

questions.question: Describe the purpose of two registers that are used by Von Neumann architecture.
Describe what is meant by a clock speed of 3.8GHz.
Explain why this statement is not always true: 'My computer has a quad-core processor, so it will run twice as fast as a computer with a dual-core processor.'
keywords: software may be designed for 1 core

questions.question: Explain how virtual memory can compensate for the lack of RAM in Alicia’s computer.
keywords: VM used when RAM is full
data from RAM moved to secondary storage/VM
RAM can then be filled with new data

questions.question: Explain the impact of excessive use of virtual memory on the performance of Alicia’s computer.
keywords: excessive use can cause disk thrashing
VM slower to access than RAM direct
moving data between RAM and VM takes processor time

questions.question: Explain what is meant by a protocol.
Identify a protocol that could be used to send large video files from a laptop to a server and describe its use.
Identify a protocol that is used to encrypt data during online transactions and describe its use.
keywords: HTTPS / hyper text transfer protocol secure

questions.question: Identify one protocol Alicia’s email client might use to retrieve email and one protocol it might use to send email.
